authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description: params defines the x/distribution parameters to update. NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

MsgUpdateParams.title: Msg Update Params
MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

base_proposer_reward.description: Deprecated: The base_proposer_reward field is deprecated and is no longer used in the x/distribution module's reward mechanism.

bonus_proposer_reward.description: Deprecated: The bonus_proposer_reward field is deprecated and is no longer used in the x/distribution module's reward mechanism.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.Params.title: Params
cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.Params.description: Params defines the set of params for the distribution module.
